'''Deepwood Illumination''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deepwood Illumination is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Luxuriant Woodlands|Luxuriant Woodlands]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Karmaphala Wood = 12
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|sort = Karmaphala Wood;White Iron Chunk
}}
